channel.title: Eligibilities on KIDDERMINSTER AID IN SICKNESS FUND (KAiSF)
channel.description: Recent content in Eligibilities on KIDDERMINSTER AID IN SICKNESS FUND (KAiSF)

item.title: Eligibility
item.description: What are the criteria for applying? Applicants must reside in the former borough of Kidderminster. (A postcode within the former borough of Kidderminster, not wider Wyre Forest area). Applicants must present clear evidence of illness and financial need. For example suffering from physical or mental illness. Applicants, or applicant supporters, must fully complete our application form, and provide additional proof of circumstances, e.g. Doctor’s medical letter, Social Services letter, or an other supportingletter.
